org.intellimate.izou.security

Class SecurityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.SecurityManager
      • org.intellimate.izou.security.SecurityManager

  • public final class SecurityManager
extends SecurityManager
    The IzouSecurityManager gives permission to all entitled components of Izou to execute or access files or commands. It also blocks access to all potentially insecure actions.

    • Method Detail

      • createSecurityManager

        public static SecurityManager createSecurityManager(SystemMail systemMail,
                                                    Main main)
                                             throws IllegalAccessException
        Creates a SecurityManager. There can only be one single SecurityManager, so calling this method twice will cause an illegal access exception.
        Parameters:
        systemMail - the system mail object in order to send e-mails to owner in case of emergency
        main - a reference to the main instance
        Returns:
        a SecurityManager from Izou
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - thrown if this method is called more than once

      • getOrThrowAddOnModelForClassLoader

        public AddOnModel getOrThrowAddOnModelForClassLoader()
                                              throws IzouPermissionException
        Gets the current AddOnModel, that is the AddOnModel for the class loader to which the class belongs that triggered the security manager call, or throws a IzouPermissionException
        Returns:
        AddOnModel or IzouPermissionException if the call was made from an AddOn, or null if no AddOn is responsible
        Throws:
        IzouPermissionException - if the AddOnModel is not found

      • shouldCheck

        public boolean shouldCheck()
        performs some basic checks to determine whether to check the permission
        Returns:
        true if should be checked, false if not

      • getSecureStorage

        public SecureStorage getSecureStorage()
        Gets the SecureStorage object in Izou
        Returns:
        the secure storage object in Izou
